title: Physical Contact - Novel Updates
tags: Assassins   Female Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Modern Day
author: An Qi   安琪
description:
Just after a passionate night, the man had become dangerous, indifferent and although she had tried her best to please him, he turned a blind eye.  She did not know whether he has any love for her but she understood, she cannot do without him...

A photo... aroused the memories of Mu Zheng.  He vowed to find her and her son that should belong to him!  However, she avoided him like a snake scorpion and did not want him to interfere with her life again.  She even blatantly dated other men, to let him know so that he would leave her alone.  But he knew that she deliberately did it to protect herself because her eyes clearly showed her love and revealed her true feelings.......>
